csci4448.AnimalShelter

Class Animal

  • java.lang.Object
    • csci4448.AnimalShelter.Animal
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Dog, Fish, Turtle

    public abstract class Animal
extends java.lang.Object
    The animal class is a superclass that contains features that all animals have, such as names, descriptions, colors, and state of adoption

        _state - the state of the animal, for example available for adoption, on hold, or adopted
